Appetizers.name: Bruschetta
Appetizers.description: Toasted slices of rustic bread topped with a flavourful blend of diced tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic, and olive oil, finished with a drizzle of balsamic glaze.

Appetizers.name: Artisan Cheese Plate
Appetizers.description: A curated selection of premium cheeses, featuring a variety of textures and flavors paired with seasonal fruits, honeycomb, and artisanal crackers.

Appetizers.name: Calamari
Appetizers.description: Tender squid rings lightly coated in seasoned flour, fried to a golden crispness, and served with a tangy marinara sauce infused with garlic, lemon zest, and herbs.

Appetizers.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
Appetizers.description: Cremini mushroom caps filled with a savoury blend of breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and fresh herbs, baked until golden and served piping hot.

Soups_and_Salads.name: Tomato Basil Soup
Soups_and_Salads.description: A comforting blend of ripe tomatoes, fresh basil, and aromatic herbs, simmered to perfection for a rich and velvety texture.

Soups_and_Salads.name: Caesar Salad
Soups_and_Salads.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, topped with crunchy croutons, shredded Parmesan cheese, and a hint of zesty lemon.

Soups_and_Salads.name: Spinach and Strawberry Salad
Soups_and_Salads.description: Fresh spinach with sweet strawberries, toasted almonds, goat cheese, and balsamic vinaigrette.

Soups_and_Salads.name: Chicken Tortilla Soup
Soups_and_Salads.description: Hearty broth with tender chicken, corn, black beans, tomatoes, and spices, garnished with crispy tortilla strips and fresh cilantro.

Sandwiches_and_Wraps.name: Philly Cheesesteak Sandwich
Sandwiches_and_Wraps.description: Sliced steak grilled with onions and peppers, smothered in melted cheese, served on a toasted hoagie roll.

Sandwiches_and_Wraps.name: Reuben Sandwich
Sandwiches_and_Wraps.description: Thinly sliced corned beef, Swiss cheese, sauerkraut, and Russian dressing grilled between slices of rye bread.

Sandwiches_and_Wraps.name: Turkey Avocado Wrap
Sandwiches_and_Wraps.description: Sliced turkey breast, creamy avocado, lettuce, tomato, and a zesty aioli, wrapped in a soft tortilla.

Sandwiches_and_Wraps.name: Veggie Panini
Sandwiches_and_Wraps.description: Grilled sandwich with a medley of roasted vegetables, melted cheese, and pesto aioli on crispy ciabatta bread.

Desserts.name: New York Style Cheesecake
Desserts.description: Rich and creamy cheesecake with a velvety smooth texture, topped with a decadent layer of sour cream and served on a buttery graham cracker crust.

Desserts.name: Crème Brûlée
Desserts.description: A classic French dessert featuring a smooth, creamy custard base infused with vanilla, topped with a caramelized sugar crust.

Desserts.name: Tiramisu
Desserts.description: A traditional Italian dessert made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfinger biscuits and mascarpone cheese, dusted with cocoa powder for a rich and indulgent treat.

Desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Desserts.description: Decadent chocolate cake with a gooey, molten chocolate center, served warm and topped with a dusting of powdered sugar.

Beverages.name: Hot Coffee
Beverages.description: Freshly brewed coffee served piping hot, available in regular or decaf options.

Beverages.name: Hot Tea
Beverages.description: A selection of premium teas, served hot and brewed to perfection.

Beverages.name: Mango Smoothie
Beverages.description: A refreshing blend of ripe mangoes, creamy yoghurt, and a splash of orange juice, perfectly chilled and garnished with a slice of fresh mango.

Beverages.name: Fresh Orange Juice
Beverages.description: Our hand-squeezed orange juice offers a pure and refreshing taste of ripe oranges, perfect for a revitalizing and satisfying beverage.
